name: craft-with-typescript-template
description: A Software Crafter template to write and test clean TypeScript code with Visual Studio Code, BDD style.

scripts.test: node ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require env/set-environment-variables.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**/*.ts --require-module ts-node/register/transpile-only --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format summary --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format cucumber-console-formatter --publish-quiet

author: Adrien Joly
